summary: This document is a chain of internal FBI emails from September 26, 2019, discussing the coordination of an 'epstein victim list' for the purpose of sending out victim notifications. It references the involvement of attorney Gloria Allred and a victim specialist named Angela.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned as representing two victims in the Epstein case. Her email address (gallred@amglaw.com) is provided in the correspondence.

persons.name: Angela
persons.context: A victim specialist at the FBI's New York Field Office who is working on the Epstein victim list and trying to contact attorneys.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the email sender will consult with regarding the victim list.

connections.description: Attorney Allred is representing victims in the Epstein case, and Victim Specialist Angela is attempting to contact attorneys as part of the victim notification process.

events.title: FBI Coordination on Epstein Victim List
events.description: Internal FBI email chain discussing the compilation and verification of an Epstein victim list to facilitate victim notifications.

keyFacts: The FBI's Victim Services Division was actively compiling and cross-referencing an 'epstein victim list' as of September 2019.
Attorney Gloria Allred was confirmed to be representing two victims in the case.
The primary purpose of the list was to 'get notices out' to victims, indicating an ongoing legal or investigative process requiring victim notification.
